lenders.loan_because: We want to be involved in direct financing of an entrepreneur who needs our funds.
lenders.occupational_info:
The original funds were donated by a Money and Banking economics class at the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee.  Students in a Money and Banking class at the University of Colorado have added to that amount.  As we study financial markets, Kiva provides a perfect opportunity to explore the role of risk and return.

(please note that our participation should not be taken as an endorsement by the University of Wisconsin - Milwaukee or the University of Colorado).

lenders.name: Jim

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but my role as a  social worker was as a local government worker. I had many different programs that I worked in during my career. This took the form of training, employment, education assistance, as well as a place to live. Social work became my niche. In retirement I try to keep myself involved as a volunteer in helping people.

lenders.name: Student Micro Lenders
lenders.loan_because:
As Confucious said, "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."

We are high school students and this is our way of doing community service.  Benefits from this effort are:
* We get to help people in a lasting way.
* We get to learn about cultures and living conditions around the world.
* Learn communication and leadership skills.
* Learn responsibility and value of money.

lenders.name: Monique

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a university. . .I want to give what I can, and I want to help whomever -as I am able, no matter who they are, where they are, or what they believe...It's time to make changes in the world...even as just a student, we can do great things for one another. I have not achieved anything alone. I have been helped by many people to achieve my goals, and to be able to study, which is a great blessing! I wish to Thank Jesus for my blessings by  helping others achieve their dreams and goals, even if it is just a little piece at a time.

lenders.name: Peter & Laura
lenders.loan_because:
To change the world you have to start with one starfish:

The Starfish Story
Original Story by: Loren Eisley

One day a man was walking along the beach when he noticed a boy picking something up and gently throwing it into the ocean.
Approaching the boy, he asked, “What are you doing?”
The youth replied, “Throwing starfish back into the ocean.  The surf is up and the tide is going out.  If I don’t throw them back, they’ll die.”
“Son,” the man said, “don’t you realize there are miles and miles of beach and hundreds of starfish?  You can’t make a difference!”

After listening politely, the boy bent down, picked up another starfish, and threw it back into the surf.  Then, smiling at the man, he said, ”I made a difference for that one.”

lenders.occupational_info:
Goodday,
 
i am a private money lender with banking partnerships that will guaranty loans of any amount.i work in the UK and i give out both local and international loans based on a 5% interest rate.my informations are included below.
send me your identification details and details on how you want the loan to be released to you.

send your informations to me today:
 
Name:
Addresss:
Phone number:
Date of Birth:
Occupation:
Amount of Loan:
Loan Duration Limit:

Your transfer will be done within a couple of days as soon as all proceedings have been met.
 
feel free to communicate with me.you can give me a call at anytime.
